name: Flavia Morgulis
title: Cloud & DevOps-Oriented Software Engineer | Product & Systems Thinker
bio: Cloud- and DevOps-focused technical professional with strong software engineering and system design experience. Career changer bringing hands-on experience from startups, operations, and product delivery into building reliable, scalable, and user-centered systems. Skilled in Python, Linux, cloud fundamentals, relational databases, and automation. Known for analytical problem-solving, systems thinking, and translating business requirements into technical solutions with real-world impact. Applies behavior-aware product thinking to reduce user friction and improve workflow reliability.

experience.description: Designed and operated end-to-end business systems including client onboarding workflows, scheduling, billing, and reporting. Built and optimized operational processes with a focus on efficiency, data tracking, and scalability. Gained hands-on experience in product thinking, system design, and decision-making under real business constraints.

Collaborated with IT to integrate multiple systems and improve operational workflows. Produced data-driven reports to inform technical improvements and product decisions. Applied systems thinking to process design and delivery of a new mobility service.

Supported large-scale operations with workflow optimization and data-driven reporting. Assisted management in operational decision-making and process documentation. Contributed to securing a major long-term contract by analyzing data and suggesting system improvements.

Led product development from market research to production and distribution. Designed operational processes, managed suppliers, budgets, and contracts. Made data-informed decisions across product, operations, and growth, applying early-stage product thinking.

projects.title: Linux DevOps Python Platform
projects.description: An evolving DevOps-focused platform combining Linux, Python, containerization, and cloud infrastructure concepts. Demonstrates infrastructure automation, CI/CD pipelines, containerized services, and deployment strategies with a focus on scalable and maintainable systems.

projects.title: System Monitoring & Log Analysis Tool
projects.description: Python-based system monitoring and log analysis tool for Linux environments. Collects CPU, memory, disk, and network metrics and surfaces anomalies through alerts and dashboards. Demonstrates systems thinking, operational awareness, and data-driven troubleshooting.

projects.title: Financial Tracking Web Application
projects.description: Full-stack web application built with Flask and SQLAlchemy. Designed relational database schemas, backend APIs, and user-facing interfaces. Led development using Agile practices, focusing on data integrity, security, and maintainability.

experimental_projects.name: DevOps & Linux Labs
experimental_projects.description: Small experiments exploring Linux internals, containerization, automation scripts, and cloud deployment workflows. Used to validate concepts before applying them to production-style projects.

books.why_it_matters: Learning how scalable systems handle data, reliability, and trade-offs
